text: On 19 December 2016, Russian diplomat Andrei Karlov was shot dead during an exhibition in Ankara, Turkey. He was shot dead by an assailant who was angry about Russian involvement in Syria and the deaths of civilians in Aleppo. == References == Category:2016 in Turkey Category:2010s murders in Asia Category:2010s in Ankara Category:Crime in Turkey Category:December 2016 events Category:Murder in 2016 Category:Murders by firearm Category:Terrorist incidents in 2016 Category:Terrorist incidents in Asia in the 2010s
title: Assassination of Andrei Karlov
